mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT(PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_CNT, PRODUCT_FEATURE, PRODUCT_CONTENT) VALUES(PRODUCT_ID_seq.nextval,#{productName},#{productPrice},#{productCnt},#{productFeature},#{productContent})
mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_CNT, PRODUCT_FEATURE, PRODUCT_CONTENT from product order by PRODUCT_ID asc

SELECT count(*) FROM (SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_CNT, PRODUCT_FEATURE, PRODUCT_CONTENT FROM product WHERE REGEXP_LIKE (PRODUCT_NAME, '(*)'||#{searchWord}||'(*)') ORDER BY PRODUCT_ID ASC )

SELECT * FROM (SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_CNT, PRODUCT_FEATURE, PRODUCT_CONTENT, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM PRODUCT WHERE REGEXP_LIKE (PRODUCT_NAME, '(*)'||#{searchWord}||'(*)') ORDER BY PRODUCT_ID ASC ) WHERE RNUM>=#{startRow} and RNUM<=#{endRow}
